languages.text: На выживших солдатах тяжелые ранения от гаусс-оружия. Даже самый искусный хирургеон вряд ли смог бы залатать эти раны.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] На солдатах тяжелые ранения от гаусс-оружия. Вряд ли средства человеческой медицины смогут их спасти.

languages.text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.
languages.original_text: На выживших солдатах тяжелые ранения от гаусс-оружия. Даже самый искусный хирургеон вряд ли смог бы залатать эти раны.

traits.locale_text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.

The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.

languages.text: 幸存的士兵身上残留着高斯武器残留的严重创伤，哪怕是最熟练的外科医生，恐怕也无力治愈这样的伤势。
languages.original_text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.

traits.locale_text: 幸存的士兵身上残留着高斯武器残留的严重创伤，哪怕是最熟练的外科医生，恐怕也无力治愈这样的伤势。

languages.text: 生き残った兵士はガウスウェポンによる重傷を負っている。熟練のチラージョンですら、彼らを治癒することは出来ないだろう。
languages.original_text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.

traits.locale_text: 生き残った兵士はガウスウェポンによる重傷を負っている。熟練のチラージョンですら、彼らを治癒することは出来ないだろう。

languages.text: Les soldats survivants présentent de graves blessures infligées par des armes Gauss. Même le plus habile des chirurgeons serait bien incapable de les soigner.
languages.original_text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.

traits.locale_text: Les soldats survivants présentent de graves blessures infligées par des armes Gauss. Même le plus habile des chirurgiens serait bien incapable de les soigner.

languages.text: Los soldados que han sobrevivido muestran graves heridas producidas por armas gauss. Ni el cirujano más cualificado podría encontrar la forma de curarlos.
languages.original_text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.

traits.locale_text: Los soldados que han sobrevivido muestran graves heridas producidas por armas gauss. Ni el cirujano más cualificado podría encontrar la forma de curarlos.

languages.text: Die überlebenden Soldaten haben schwere Verletzungen durch Gauss-Waffen erlitten. Selbst der geschickteste Chirurg könnte sie vermutlich nicht heilen.
languages.original_text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.

traits.locale_text: Die überlebenden Soldaten haben schwere Verletzungen durch Gauss-Waffen erlitten. Selbst der geschickteste Chirurg könnte sie vermutlich nicht heilen.

languages.text: Hayatta kalan askerler, manyetik silahlardan büyük yaralar almış. En yetenekli cerrah bile bu yaraları iyileştiremez.
languages.original_text: The surviving soldiers bear grave wounds inflicted by gauss weapons. Even the most skilled chirurgeon would likely be powerless to heal them.
